title: core: improve test coverage
body:
Issue to track coverage of core packages and subsequent tests & cleanup

Core packages code not covered by https://github.com/ethereum/tests

This list includes functions not used by consensus-critical code but used by e.g. RPC API - please cross out those once verified that they cannot affect consensus.

Also it exposes some unused code and parts of code that cannot be reached in current use, e.g. some internal RLP decoding error clauses which cannot happen unless there is DB corruption or some other internal bug that can't really be triggered by a valid test scenario.

core/types/block.go:
- [ ] `NewBlock` when there are no txs.
- [ ] `(b *Block)` ValidateFields (used by eth/handler.go when a block message is received)

core/types/block.go:

- [ ] `NewContractCreation` (not consensus protocol, coverage should be added in xeth as it's used by APIs)

- [x] `(tx *Transaction) Cost` not used by consensus protocol, covered by core unit tests.
- [ ] `(tx *Transaction) publicKey()` when public key _after_ recovery is invalid.
- [ ] `(tx *Transaction) WithSignature` not used by consensus protocol. partly covered by core unit tests but needs test for when crypto.Sign fails.
- [ ] `(tx *Transaction) SignECDSA` same as above
